text: is a private university in Chiyoda, Tokyo, Japan. ==History== The school was founded in 1877. It was established as a university in 1949.Nishogakusha University, "History"; retrieved 2012-12-20. ==Campuses== There are two campusesâ€”the Kundan campusNishogakusha University, "Kundan campus"; retrieved 2012-12-20. and the Kashiwa campus.Nishogakusha University, "Kashiwa campus"; retrieved 2012-12-20. ==References== ==Other websites== * Nishogakusha University website ; Category:Colleges and universities in Tokyo Category:1877 establishments Category:1870s establishments in Japan
